text: Hossein Erfani Parsaei (; 1942 - 12 September 2018) was an Iranian voice actor. He was born in Tehran. Erfani was known for Persian voice-dubbing in foreign movies. Erfani voiced dubbed Humphrey Bogart roles in Maltese Falcon and Casablanca and Clark Gable role as Rhett Butler From Gone with the Wind. He has also dubbed over some of Orson Welles, Marlon Brando, Charlton Heston, Gene Hackman, Toshiro Mifune, William Holden, Morgan Freeman and Arnold Schwarzenegger. Erfani died in Tehran of lung cancer on 12 September 2018 at the age of 76. ==Famous dubbing== Some of Hossein Erfani's Works Actor Role Film Humphrey Bogart Sam Spade Maltese Falcon Clark Gable Rhett Butler Gone with the Wind Orson Welles Othello Othello Marlon Brando Fletcher Christian Mutiny on the Bounty Morgan Freeman Ellis Boyd The Shawshank Redemption Arnold Schwarzenegger The Terminator/T-800 Model 101 Terminator 2 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Actors from Tehran Category:Iranian voice actors
title: Hossein Erfani
